column5: Well it was a fine time with good eats and good company. Discussed many a tactic and fishing experinces. The ladies in the group held their own, being just as avid if not more than the gents.  Here are a couple of pics:   CCMT and Blythe   Tybo
Glad you all had a great time.

Blyght and I had a great time at our first ever OFC get together.  Chatting with Clampett, HearingFish and of course Joey and Tybo was awesome!  Thanks for the pics and report Paul!  Also, thanks to HearingFish for organizing this one...much appreciated!
Looks like a good time. Wish I was available earlier to attend.  Always nice to see OFNCers getting together.

Paul and I had a great time also, and it was just down the road  Nice to meet you Clampet, Cliff, Carol, Lisa, Hearingfish and Mr. K!  And Carol, we definately have to get together soon  Here's some pics I took, and make sure you check out the Flinstone sized beef ribs some of us ordered, not only were they delicious, but enormous and very filling.             Cheers,  Joey

Nice pic's Joey... funny you mentioned the Flintstone Ribs... Gary, Taper and I had "The Brontosauras Burgers" at the London Swill...  "Brontosaurus Burger $6.99 YaBa DaBa Doo! For those with an unlimited appetite.  A 12 oz. char-broiled Beef Patti, fully loaded with bacon and cheese.  Served with fried potatoes and garnish."  Here's a thought... we'll all meet at the Milton Quary for a swill - the London crowd can bring the Brontosauras Burgers and the GTA crowd can bring...... the beer

Good to see everyone both here in London and you all out that way had a great time swilling this evening....I think Nauti is trying to come up with some ideas as how to bring everyone together Port Dover on her swill thread...Definetely sounds inviiting.......  Cheers !!!
Glad you guys had a good time, hopefully I'll be able to make it out to the next one.  Maureen
Wish we could have made it too..  would love to have a try at them their ribs...  Looks like you had a good time...  thanks for sharing..
CLIFF YOU NEVER TOLD ME YOU WERE ASIAN??? COULDNT TELL UNDER ALL THAT GEAR ON FRI  LOL WISH I COULD OF MADE IT BUT MR.MOM DUTIES CALLED  LOL
CANADIANCOPPER...LOL...I tried to hide my Japanese accent the whole day...man was that hard to do!!!  The funny thing about this swill is that all the asian guys forgot their cameras.....ROFL.

well looks like everyone had a great time,glad to see so many were able to attend.  .cliff thats a funny one bud...lol...and those ribs look awsome ,gettin hungry just looking at them cheers everyone sorry we could not make it to this swill maybe the next one,  cheers
Definitely have to get together again    I am still laughing about the Bass story!  Tybo...thanks for the input on the fishing gear etc.  bly
Unfortunately I was hpoing to go but missed it.  My wife, who is newly expecting, wasn't feeling well, so I had to stay home.
